channel.title: [PI] Help Java Error
channel.description:
Can anyone at all help me figure this out? I am on Windows 7 [u][b]Run.Bat[/b][/u]
@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
[u][b]Java Error[/b][/u]
java.lang.NullPointerException at ProgressChecker.run(ProgressChecker.java:37) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
Thank you so much!

item.title: [PI] Help Java Error
